tool.name: Decompress an archive
tool.description: in zip, gz, tar.gz, fastq.gz, fastq.bz2 or tar.bz2 format

param.name: rm_header
param.label: Header lines to delete
param.help: number of lines to delete at the beginning of each file

tool.help:
**Tool documentation**
This tool simply decompresses an archive file (zip, gz, tar.gz, fastq.gz, fastq.bz2 or tar.bz2) and merges all files into only one. If the merge option is enabled, you can delete as many header lines as you need.
WARNING : the filename should not have special characters (space, brackets, ...), please rename it!!!
